ComicInfo.Title: Look Homeward, Asgardian!
ComicInfo.Summary: Look Homeward, Asgardian!: The Eternals give Thor one day to try to stop the Celestials before they attack. Thor tries to return to Asgard but is stopped by the combined might of the Asgardians on the Rainbow Bridge and thrown back down to Midgard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:14. [Issue ID 33862]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Balder (cameo),Destroyer,Odin,Ares,Karnilla the Norn Queen,Heimdall,The Forgotten One,Thor,Sersi,The Midgard Serpent (flashback,Ikaris,Athena,cameo),Reject],Sif,Eternals [Zuras,Lodur,Hercules,Zeus,Sprite,Mutates [Karkas,Delphan Brothers,Thena,Argus the One-Eyed,Makkari],Frigga,Celestials [The One Above All,Sleipnir (Odin's Eight-Legged Horse),Arishem]
